markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cross the Final Horizon](/Feats.aspx?ID=2205) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Electricity" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=56" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Force" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=75" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 225, [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Jalmeri Heavenseeker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=198)

**Prerequisites**
[Sky and Heaven Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2200)

**Requirements**
You are in Sky and Heaven Stance.

</column>

---

You Stride up to your Speed, and your ki enshrouds your limbs in terrifying stormy energy, increasing the [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) of your Sky and Heaven Stance [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks by 5 feet. At the end of your movement, make up to three Strikes against a target you can reach, each at a –2 penalty. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after you've made all your attacks. Instead of the usual slashing or piercing damage, the damage for these Strikes is either electricity or sonic, as you choose with each Strike. If you successfully hit with all three Strikes, the target is [drained 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10).
name: Cross the Final Horizon
requirement: You are in Sky and Heaven Stance.
requirement_markdown: You are in Sky and Heaven Stance.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 20" pfs="Standard" > Cross the Final Horizon Three Actions Source Impossible Lands pg. 225, Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under pg. 79 Archetype Jalmeri Heavenseeker Prerequisites Sky and Heaven Stance Requirements You are in Sky and Heaven Stance. --- You Stride up to your Speed, and your ki enshrouds your limbs in terrifying stormy energy, increasing the reach of your Sky and Heaven Stance unarmed attacks by 5 feet. At the end of your movement, make up to three Strikes against a target you can reach, each at a –2 penalty. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after you've made all your attacks. Instead of the usual slashing or piercing damage, the damage for these Strikes is either electricity or sonic, as you choose with each Strike. If you successfully hit with all three Strikes, the target is drained 3.
